sentence.text: @BSYBJP sir we are fed up by this dirty congress govt..sir i am waiting forward to see u as a next cheif minister of this state @CTRavi_BJP sir u people have done a great job and showed how these congress party members are looting our stste money @KicchaSudeep congratulation sir for winning a award for eega movie u truly deserve it sir lv u sir @KicchanHudugru @BSYBJP sir u are the best and defnitley u will be the next cheif minister of this state @mepratap That is the power of our BJP sir @narendramodi congrats modiji for the massive victory in UP and Jharkand.

This shows that all 125 crores of people are there with u JAI HIND @AmitShah congrts sir for getting a 300 above seats in UP and as well as for u r hard work which makes the bjp to get a massive victory .

Today i join bjp party in the prescence of @BSYBJP @mepratap ..ty sir for all the support and encouragement ...lv u sir.. https://t.co/OV3SdFoDT9 @mepratap Sir write a article abt lord Basaveshvara on the eve of basava jayanthi.
I hope u will fullfill my request @mepratap Superb pic bro....
Finally u achieved the success in bringing the train #huballi- mysore express @mepratap ...good job sir @manoharparrikar Happy birthday sir ....
